      Constructor
      参数:

      抛出:

  • 方法详细资料

    • shift

      public void shift(Token token) throws exceptions.ExpressionException, exceptions.LexicalException, exceptions.SemanticException
      shift the token and check the syntax
      参数:
      token - the token to be shifted
      抛出:
      exceptions.ExpressionException - when the expression is illegal
      exceptions.LexicalException - when the syntax is illegal
      exceptions.SemanticException - when the semantics is illegal

    • reduce

      public void reduce(int size, Token newToken, Double newValue) throws exceptions.ExpressionException, exceptions.LexicalException, exceptions.SemanticException
      reduce the tokens in the given rule
      参数:
      size - the size of the tokens to be reduced
      newToken - the token reduced to
      newValue - the value reduced to
      抛出:
      exceptions.ExpressionException - when the expression is illegal
      exceptions.LexicalException - when the syntax is illegal
      exceptions.SemanticException - when the semantics is illegal

    • reduce

      public void reduce(int size, Token newToken) throws exceptions.ExpressionException, exceptions.LexicalException, exceptions.SemanticException
      overload the reduce function defaultly set the new value to 0.0
      参数:
      size - the size of the tokens to be reduced
      newToken - the token reduced to
      抛出:
      exceptions.ExpressionException - when the expression is illegal
      exceptions.LexicalException - when the syntax is illegal
      exceptions.SemanticException - when the semantics is illegal

    • evaluate

      public double evaluate() throws exceptions.ExpressionException, exceptions.LexicalException, exceptions.SemanticException
      evaluate the expression this is the main function of the class
      返回:
      the value of the expression
      抛出:
      exceptions.ExpressionException - when the expression is illegal
      exceptions.LexicalException - when the syntax is illegal
      exceptions.SemanticException - when the semantics is illegal
